knowledges.content: Amelia wakes up and thinks,  "Today is my first day of school."  .
"Carlos,  what do I have to do?" asks Amelia. "I will tell you," replies Carlos. .
Carlos tells Amelia to wash her face. Amelia says,  "I can wash my face. And then?" .
Carlos tells Amelia to brush her teeth. Amelia says,  "I can brush my teeth. And then?" .
Carlos tells Amelia that she must eat. Amelia says,  "I know how to eat. And then?" .
Carlos tells Amelia to put on her uniform. Amelia says,  "I can put on my uniform. And then?" .
Carlos tells Amelia to pick up her bag. Amelia says,  "I can pick up my bag. And then?"     .
Carlos says,  "You must go to school." Amelia says,  "I can go to school. And then?" .
Carlos says,  "You must enter the classroom."Amelia replies,  "I can enter the classroom. And then?" .

You are free to download, copy, translate or adapt this story and use the illustrations as long as you attribute in the following way:
I Can Do This!

World Education
Translation -
Isabelle Duston
